sn55.51:1: "Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo.
sn55.51:2: Katamehi catūhi? Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti – itipi so bhagavā … pe … satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavāti. Dhamme … pe … saṅghe … pe … ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi … pe … samādhisaṁvattanikehi.
sn55.51:3: "Yassa saddhā tathāgate,acalā suppatiṭṭhitā;Sīlañca yassa kalyāṇaṁ,ariyakantaṁ pasaṁsitaṁ.
sn55.51:4: Saṅghe pasādo yassatthi,ujubhūtañca dassanaṁ;Adaliddoti taṁ āhu,amoghaṁ tassa jīvitaṁ.
sn55.51:5: Tasmā saddhāñca sīlañca,pasādaṁ dhammadassanaṁ;Anuyuñjetha medhāvī,saraṁ buddhānasāsanan"ti.
